description:
CachyOS ISO snapshot for February 2025 is now available for download with Linux kernel 6.13, NVIDIA 570 graphics driver, and more. Here's what's new!

The post CachyOS ISO Snapshot for February 2025 Brings Linux Kernel 6.13, NVIDIA 570 Driver appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: CachyOS ISO Snapshot for February 2025 Brings Linux Kernel 6.13, NVIDIA 570 Driver
